skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 3 turns if this attack kills 4 or more enemies.
Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP if this attack kills 6 or more enemies.
Grants an Extra Turn if this attack kills 10 or more enemies.
skills.name: Harvest of Despair
